examples.example: 全体师生共同努力，营造了积极向上的学习氛围。

translate.english: All the teachers and students work together to create a positive learning atmosphere.

examples.example: 全体运动员们在赛场上努力拼搏，展现出了卓越的体育精神。

translate.english: All the athletes strive hard on the field and show excellent sportsmanship.

examples.example: 全体志愿者齐心协力，为社会贡献了自己的力量。

translate.english: All the volunteers worked together and contributed their own strength to the society.
